lyrics.lyric: It takes a lot to know what is love
lyrics.tlyric: 需要经历很多，才能明白什么是爱

lyrics.lyric: A lot of prayers to get me through
lyrics.tlyric: 很多次的祈祷帮我渡过了难关

lyrics.lyric: And there is never a day that passes by
lyrics.tlyric: 过去的日子里没有一天

lyrics.lyric: You were always there for me
When I was young just how to grow
lyrics.tlyric: 当年轻时，我该如何成长
我应该知晓的每一件事

lyrics.lyric: Just how to walk without your hands
lyrics.tlyric: 离开你时我该怎样前进
家人愿意为我付出一切

lyrics.lyric: And I've had many years of grace
And it flatters me when I see a smile on your face
lyrics.tlyric: 你脸上的笑容也让我感到高兴

lyrics.lyric: I wanna thank you for what you've done
lyrics.tlyric: 我要感谢你所做的一切

lyrics.lyric: In hopes I can give back to you
lyrics.tlyric: 希望我可以好好报答你

lyrics.lyric: When I was young just how to grow
lyrics.tlyric: 当年轻时，我该如何成长
我应该知晓的每一件事

lyrics.lyric: Just how to walk without your hands
lyrics.tlyric: 离开你时我该怎样前进

lyrics.lyric: You showed me how to love
You showed me how to care
And you showed me that you would always be there
lyrics.tlyric: 你教会了我，你会一直在那里守护我

lyrics.lyric: I wanna thank you for that time
lyrics.tlyric: 我要感谢那些你陪伴我的时光

lyrics.lyric: And I'm proud to say you're mine
lyrics.tlyric: 我可以自豪地说，你是属于我的

lyrics.lyric: When I was young just how to grow
lyrics.tlyric: 当年轻时，我该如何成长
我应该知晓的每一件事

lyrics.lyric: Just how to walk without your hands
lyrics.tlyric: 离开你时我该怎样前进

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Littrell, Smith
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Brian T. Littrell/Thomas L. Smith
[00:16.590]It takes a lot to know what is love
[00:23.460]It's not the big things, but the little things
[00:26.600]That can mean enough
[00:30.0]A lot of prayers to get me through
[00:34.800]And there is never a day that passes by
[00:39.940]I don't think of you
[00:43.870]You were always there for me
[00:49.870]Pushing me and guiding me
[00:53.230]Always to succeed
[00:57.529]You showed me
[01:00.459]When I was young just how to grow
[01:04.230]You showed me
[01:07.140]Everything that I should know
[01:10.899]You showed me
[01:13.800]Just how to walk without your hands
[01:18.300]'Cause mom you always were
[01:20.229]The perfect fan
[01:37.759]God has been so good
[01:44.280]Blessing me with a family
[01:47.770]Who did all they could
[01:51.229]And I've had many years of grace
[01:57.750]And it flatters me when I see a smile on your face
[02:04.520]I wanna thank you for what you've done
[02:08.400]In hopes I can give back to you
[02:14.540]And be the perfect son
[02:18.329]You showed me
[02:21.460]When I was young just how to grow
[02:25.280]You showed me
[02:28.220]Everything that I should know
[02:31.170]You showed me
[02:34.720]Just how to walk without your hands
[02:37.970]'Cause mom you always were
[02:41.210]The perfect fan
[02:45.900]You showed me how to love
[02:52.340]You showed me how to care
[02:59.110]And you showed me that you would
[03:03.250]always be there
[03:05.860]I wanna thank you for that time
[03:09.400]And I'm proud to say you're mine
[03:13.360]You showed me
[03:16.340]When I was young just how to grow
[03:20.100]You showed me
[03:23.120]Everything that I should know
[03:26.560]You showed me
[03:29.940]Just how to walk without your hands
[03:33.170]'Cause mom you always were
[03:37.390]The perfect fan
[03:44.440]'Cause mom you always were,
[03:46.800]mom you always were
[03:48.210]Mom you always were,
[03:50.160]you know you always were
[03:53.390]'Cause mom you always were...
[03:55.760] the perfect fan
[04:06.100]I love you mom

tlyric.lyric:
[by:Octothorpe]
[00:16.590]经过很多事情，才知道什么是爱
[00:23.460]不是宏伟大事，而是日常小事
[00:26.600]这已足够证明你的爱
[00:30.0]很多祈望让我明白
[00:34.800]因为我知道
[00:39.940]你的陪伴，从未离开
[00:43.870]你一直在那儿
[00:49.870]激励我，指引我
[00:53.230]直到成功
[00:57.529]你教会我
[01:00.459]怎样从稚嫩走向成熟
[01:04.230]你教会我
[01:07.140]我应知晓的每件事情
[01:10.899]你教会我
[01:13.800]怎样离开你的怀抱，扬帆起航
[01:18.300]因为妈妈你总是我的
[01:20.229]最棒的粉丝
[01:37.759]上帝真是太好了
[01:44.280]保佑我有了一个
[01:47.770]愿意为我付出一切的家
[01:51.229]我已受到多年的恩宠
[01:57.750]你脸上的笑容，更是对我的恩泽
[02:04.520]谢谢你，为我所做的一切
[02:08.400]希望有天我能报答你
[02:14.540]并做你最棒的儿子
[02:18.329]你教会我
[02:21.460]怎样从稚嫩走向成熟
[02:25.280]你教会我
[02:28.220]我应知晓的每件事情
[02:31.170]你教会我
[02:34.720]怎样离开你的怀抱，扬帆起航
[02:37.970]因为妈妈你总是我的
[02:41.210]最棒的粉丝
[02:45.900]你教会我怎样爱
[02:52.340]你教会我怎样关心
[02:59.110]我知道
[03:03.250]你会永远在那守护我
[03:05.860]谢谢你陪我的时光
[03:09.400]我可以傲娇的说，你是我的
[03:13.360]你教会我
[03:16.340]怎样从稚嫩走向成熟
[03:20.100]你教会我
[03:23.120]我应知晓的每件事情
[03:26.560]你教会我
[03:29.940]怎样离开你的怀抱，扬帆起航
[03:33.170]因为妈妈你总是我的
[03:37.390]最棒的粉丝
[03:44.440]因为妈妈你总是我的
[03:46.800]总是我的
[03:48.210]总是我的
[03:50.160]你知道你永远是我的
[03:53.390]因为妈妈你总是我的
[03:55.760]最棒的粉丝
[04:06.100]爱你，妈妈（送给全天下的妈妈，I'm sugarman,hiahia～）
